Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HG1 L11Q (Synthetic AMPs, homodimer, Halocidin analog, UCSS2a, XXA)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is 94.74% similar toHG1L: 21%, A: 16%, G=N=H=K: 11%. Warning: chain B sequence is the same as chain A.Chemical modification:  there is an intermolecular S-S bond between the two chains.Activity: active against S. aureus MRSA (MIC 8 ug/ml). Warning: other bacteria not tested
Literature Information.Author: Shin SH, Kim B, Park S, Jo S, Lee IH. 2014
Literature Information.Title: Haloganan: a novel antimicrobial peptide for treatmentof wound infections.
